name: GALLEX, and
description:
This is 'GALLEX, and', a new video game from Outhouse Media. With your support, we will be able to continue the development of this fantasy RPG.
Here's what we need your support for: - The cost of an early development version of the game - Your time and patience - The rest of the money from our Kickstarter stretch goals and beyond GALLEX is a fantasy RPG developed by Outhouse Publishing, an indie title based in a small town just north of Seattle, WA. And for those of you who love elves, goblins, and bad guys the game looks like this: The game will be released in roughly 18 months, and we have huge plans for it. When the project reaches its funding goal, the entire funding will be used to complete the core two chapters (and potentially the modules in between). As a special thank you to all backers who have pledged to help us reach our goal, the game will be available for preorder! Preorder includes 70 cards, 17 of which are custom designed for the game. The game is available in 52 languages, and we are working to bring more in the future. How to Get Yours Today: To receive your game, simply add $20 to your pledge using this link: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/4315/GALLEX Shipping will be calculated as the total amount awarded to the pledge level above, and some stretch goals
